response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. We believe in creating value through innovation and excellence, and this product embodies our commitment to delivering superior quality. Given its unique features and benefits, we estimate its worth to be $12,000 to you. However, considering the exceptional craftsmanship and materials used, I am offering it to you for an exclusive price of $14,999. This is an opportunity to secure a high-value item at a competitive rate, ensuring you receive maximum value for your investment. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of enhancing your experience with our product.", "product_price": 14999}
